description: This file defines two functions, create_app and acreate_app, which handle synchronous and asynchronous creation of an application using an API client, with configuration checks and error logging.

methods.name: create_app
methods.description: Synchronously creates an application via API, with configuration check and error handling.

methods.name: acreate_app
methods.description: Asynchronously creates an application via API, with configuration check and error handling.
